pygtc.py
--------
Make a giant triangle confusogram (GTC) that is suitable for publication with
one line of code! A GTC is a corner (or triangle) plot that has multiple sets of
data plotted in it.

Installation
============
Install with ``pip install pygtc`` or you can download the source at https://github.com/SebastianBocquet/pygtc.

API
===
.. autofunction :: pygtc.plotGTC
